verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, great <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> marvellous <S%G2298><s%>, seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%>, which are the last <S%G2078><s%>, for <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> is finished <S%G5055><s%> the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> a sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%> mingled <S%G3396><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> them that come off victorious <S%G3528><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image <S%G1504><s%>, and from <S%G1537><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, standing <S%G2476><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> harps <S%G2788><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they sing <S%G103><s%> the song <S%G5603><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the song <S%G5603><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Great <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> marvellous <S%G2298><s%> are thy <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, O Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the Almighty <S%G3841><s%>; righteous <S%G1342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> true <S%G228><s%> are thy <S%G4675><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%>, thou King <S%G935><s%> of the ages <S%G40><s%>.

Who <S%G5101><s%> shall <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%>, <S%G4571><s%> O Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>? for <S%G3754><s%> thou only <S%G3441><s%> art holy <S%G3741><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> righteous acts <S%G1345><s%> have been made manifest <S%G5319><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%>, and2532, Proverbs0 the temple <S%G3485><s%> of the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> of the testimony <S%G3142><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> there came <S%G1831><s%> out from the temple <S%G3485><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> that had <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%>, arrayed <S%G1746><s%> with precious <S%G2513><s%> stone <S%G3043><s%>, pure <S%G2513><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bright <S%G2986><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> girt <S%G4024><s%> about their <S%G4012><s%> breasts <S%G4738><s%> with golden <S%G5552><s%> girdles <S%G2223><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> unto the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> bowls <S%G5357><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, who liveth <S%G2198><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> was filled <S%G1072><s%> with smoke <S%G2586><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> was able <S%G1410><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%>, till <S%G891><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> should be finished <S%G5055><s%>.
